p: Regarding the effectiveness of combinations of the treatments on reducing foliage cover percentage and density or quantity of soil seedbank, single treatments, as well as combinations of two, three or four treatments, were significantly effective within a few months. However, not all treatments were equally effective. Single treatments (for example pine oil or mulch) were less effective than when treatments were used in combinations of two, three or four. A combination of treatments is therefore recommended because it is likely to be more cost effective in the long-term [ 39, 40].
